abstract: The lawyer defending the former chief executive of General Reinsurance against fraud charges pointed the finger Tuesday at the investor Warren E. Buffett.
snippet: The lawyer defending the former chief executive of General Reinsurance against fraud charges pointed the finger Tuesday at the investor Warren E. Buffett.
lead_paragraph: HARTFORD  The lawyer defending the former chief executive of General Reinsurance against fraud charges pointed the finger Tuesday at the investor Warren E. Buffett.

headline.main: At Trial, Lawyer Says Buffett Gave Approval
headline.print_headline: At Trial, Lawyer Says Buffett Gave Approval
